law.catch_line: Delivery to property officer of property taken -- Disposition.

text.section: Property taken by the Department of Kentucky State Police shall be placed with the property officer of the post to which the officer is assigned.

Property which is forfeited may be disposed of as provided by KRS 500.090 or KRS 500.092, whichever is applicable; however, the proceeds of any sale shall go to the state or be distributed as otherwise provided by law.
All other property may be disposed of as provided in KRS 67.592 and 67.594 except that all proceeds from any sale shall go to the state.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 9, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 70, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 125, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
